tags.description: Beach camping. Islet has small cabin for public use. Cabin door sign says Welcome to this shelter. It was built for a safe refuge for everyone. Please take good care when you are staying here. It may deped on saving someone or yourself.Thank you.
tags.description:other: Sand tombolo joins islet to S inland. Bird colonies. S island surveyed so might be private. N island appears to be Crown land.
tags.name: Rachel Islands BCMT site & shelter
